channel.title: Level 99
channel.description: On my server, when i do ::setlevel 1 99 or setlevel 2 99 ect. it sets the lvl to 99, but then it goes down to 98/98 and when you quickchat, it says it lvl 98, i went into the character files and changed the skills to 98, and it does the same thing. someone help :(

item.title: Level 99
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

Either something with your command or the method you use to get the xp required for 99 If you post the command we can check it out

Read full topic

item.title: Level 99
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

There might be.

Are you setting the skills experience to thirteen-million as well as making the stat ninety-nine?

Read full topic

item.title: Level 99
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Maybe there’s a prob with the actual command?

Read full topic

item.title: Level 99
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

even so if he got 13 million xp and the requirement was 13,012,000 e.g
then it would say 98/98 instead of the 98/99 as he said so i think the xp has nothing to do with it

Read full topic

item.title: Level 99
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Mental Piracy, post:9, topic:445488”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=548266.msg4019532#msg4019532 date=1339908121]

What is probably happening is you are setting the level to 99, but its only giving the experience for level 98, so whenever your server runs through any sort of stat check it drops to 98

He said his firemaking is 13m xp though
[/quote]
and the xp required is 13,035,000 or something like that, if it sets to straight 13m it wont do it[/quote]

Ah, I had no idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Level 99
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Morgan Linder:

ahh its frustrating, i dont understand we do setlevel or use the files themselves to change our stats and they go down to 98. what the fuck.

It’s not that big of a deal, if not being able to set your stats to 99 is your biggest glitch, you’re doing well so far.

But like I said, you should debug a bit

Read full topic
